channel.title: Error when trying to start server with run.bat?
channel.description:
When I try and start my server up it comes up with a unusual error that I have never ever seen or had before. The error somewhat looks like this: [code]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Any ideas on whats wrong and how can I possibly fix it?
[size=36pt]EDIT:[/size] This error has been fixed by editing the amount of memory run.bat is allowed to take up. I changed it from 128 to 256 and it works fine.

@Mee0345 wrote:

When I try and start my server up it comes up with a unusual error that I have never ever seen or had before.
The error somewhat looks like this:

Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Any ideas on whats wrong and how can I possibly fix it?

[size=36pt]EDIT:[/size]
This error has been fixed by editing the amount of memory run.bat is allowed to take up. I changed it from 128 to 256 and it works fine.
